alert.note: Alert for Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:13PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Blaine County through 300 PM MDT... At 212 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Turner, or 35 miles northeast of Chinook, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Turner and Hogeland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
